data.name: b-entertained®
data.description: The b-entertained® account allows staff to access the meal and entertainment fringe benefit component of their salary subject to a grossed up taxable value of $5,000 via a low fee debit Mastercard®.

features.additionalInfo: e-banking allows you to temporarily block a lost card while you look for it and unblock it when you find it. Or if it’s gone for good, you can cancel your card at the touch of a button. And our handy PIN changer lets you personalise your card’s PIN in seconds.
The card can be used at businesses registered as cafes, restaurants or hotels that accept Mastercard.
features.additionalValue: The card can be used at businesses registered as cafes, restaurants or hotels that accept Mastercard.

features.additionalInfo: Available with Apple Pay, Samsung Pay, Google Pay, Fitbit Pay and Garmin Pay
Make eftpos transactions for expenses that qualify as ‘meal & entertainment’ and ‘holiday accommodation/venue hire’.
Salary sacrifice up to $5,000 'grossed up' in each fringe benefit tax year
features.additionalValue: Salary sacrifice up to $5,000 'grossed up' in each fringe benefit tax year

features.additionalInfo: Available to organisations with Public Benevolent Institute (PBI) status
Other than salary sacrifice portion of wages
features.additionalValue: No BPAY, cash withdrawals or deposits

eligibility.additionalValue: Available to staff of organisations with Public Benevolent Institute (PBI) status
eligibility.additionalInfo: Available to staff of organisations with Public Benevolent Institute (PBI) status

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where your account is overdrawn without prior arrangement with us. You will be charged this fee each day your account is debited and your account remains overdrawn at the end of the day.
